com.google.gxp.compiler.parser
Interface SourceEntityResolver

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileSystemEntityResolver
public interface SourceEntityResolver

Resolves entities in source files.

The interface is similar to SAX entity resolver but an entity includes the position of the entity in the source.

Method Summary
 InputStream resolveEntity(SourcePosition entityPos, String publicId, String systemId, AlertSink alertSink)
